name: Curses & Demons
description:
Built for the Gooseberry Jam 2018

Duel in this local coop strategy game with a spin on the old game of Chess. Choose a side, Red Demon Legion. Or the Cool Cursed Kingdom and battle for the rights to rule the world!

Programming by: Stitchdoc & Lopsey

Art by: yammerinyam

Music/FX by: scowsh
